verses.verse: And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, What is the vine <S%H1612><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> more than any tree <S%H6086><s%>, or than a branch <S%H2156><s%> which is among the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the forest <S%H3293><s%>?

Shall wood <S%H6086><s%> be taken <S%H3947><s%> there to do <S%H6213><s%> any work <S%H4399><s%>? or will men take <S%H3947><s%> a pin <S%H3489><s%> of it to hang <S%H8518><s%> any vessel on it <S%H3627><s%>?

Behold <S%H5414><s%>, it is cast into the fire <S%H784><s%> for fuel <S%H402><s%>; the fire <S%H784><s%> devours <S%H398><s%> both <S%H8147><s%> the ends <S%H7098><s%> of it <S%H8432><s%>, and the midst of it is burned <S%H2787><s%>. Is it good <S%H6743><s%> for any work <S%H4399><s%>?

Behold <S%H8549><s%>, when it was whole, it was good <S%H6213><s%> for no work <S%H4399><s%>: how much less shall it be good <S%H6213><s%> yet for any work <S%H4399><s%>, when the fire <S%H784><s%> has devoured <S%H398><s%> it <S%H2787><s%>, and it is burned?

Therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>; As the vine <S%H1612><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> among the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the forest <S%H3293><s%>, which I have given <S%H5414><s%> to the fire <S%H784><s%> for fuel <S%H402><s%>, so will I give <S%H5414><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

And I will set <S%H5414><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> against them <S%H3318><s%>; they shall go out from one fire <S%H784><s%>, and another fire <S%H784><s%> shall devour <S%H398><s%> them <S%H3045><s%>; and you shall know that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, when I set <S%H7760><s%> my face against them <S%H6440><s%>.

And I will make <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> desolate <S%H8077><s%>, because they have committed <S%H4603><s%> a trespass <S%H4604><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>.
